source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a computer-generated scenery shot of a black-and-white model of a suburban neighborhood. The camera flies over the sprawling layout of houses and streets. It then zooms in to highlight a single, more detailed house, which is identified by the text "ROBERT KARDASHIAN'S HOUSE" at the bottom of the screen.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

source_caption_data.final_feedback: The description should state that the camera moves forward and downward quickly and smoothly, descending to a lower aerial level to highlight a single, more detailed house, rather than simply zooming in.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a computer-generated scenery shot of a black-and-white model of a suburban neighborhood. The camera flies over the sprawling layout of houses and streets, moving forward and downward quickly and smoothly. It descends to a lower aerial level to highlight a single, more detailed house, which is identified by the text "ROBERT KARDASHIAN'S HOUSE" at the bottom of the screen.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a computer-generated scenery shot of a black-and-white model of a suburban neighborhood. The camera flies over the sprawling layout of houses and streets, moving forward and downward quickly and smoothly. It descends to a lower aerial level to highlight a single, more detailed house, which is identified by the text "ROBERT KARDASHIAN'S HOUSE" at the bottom of the screen.

generated_critique: The caption accurately captures the chronological flow of the camera's movement from a wide aerial view to a specific focus. However, the description of the motion could be more precise. The phrase "flies over... moving forward and downward" is slightly redundant; a more integrated description like "descends in a continuous forward arc" would be more concise. The term "highlight" is also vague. To improve, the caption should specify how the house is highlighted—for instance, does the camera slow its descent to a hover, centering the house in the frame? Furthermore, while the caption mentions the identifying text, it doesn't describe the action of its appearance. A more complete description would note if the text fades in, slides into view, or simply appears abruptly once the camera's movement ceases.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a computer-generated scenery shot of a black-and-white model of a suburban neighborhood. The camera descends in a continuous forward arc over the sprawling layout of houses and streets. It then slows its descent to a hover, centering on a single, more detailed house. The text "ROBERT KARDASHIAN'S HOUSE" fades in at the bottom of the screen, identifying the house.
